# ⚡ Automated Vogue Headline → Social Media Poster

### 🧠 Purpose:

Automatically scrape trending headlines from Vogue, convert them into engaging posts using AI, and publish them to **LinkedIn** and **Twitter (X)** — *no manual effort needed*.

---

## 🔶 **Section 1: Set the Target Source**

📌 *Nodes:*

* `Run workflow`
* `Set Target News URL`

### 🛠 What’s Happening:

* ✅ `Run workflow`: Triggers the automation either manually or on a schedule (e.g., daily).
* 🖊 `Set Target News URL`: Sets the **source URL** (e.g., `https://www.vogue.com/fashion`) from where the headlines will be scraped.

### 💡 Why It Matters:

This lets you choose your news source dynamically. You could even expand this later for other websites like *TechCrunch, Forbes, etc.*

> ![🧭](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/compass_1f9ed.png) Think of this section as the **GPS** – it tells the system where to go fetch the news from.

---

## 🔷 **Section 2: Scrape & Extract Headlines**

📌 *Nodes:*

* `Scrape Vogue via Bright Data`
* `Extract Title`

### 🛠 What’s Happening:

* 🌐 `Scrape Vogue via Bright Data`: Uses **Bright Data Web Unlocker** to bypass bot protection and get the full HTML of the Vogue page using a POST request.
* 🧾 `Extract Title`: Extracts the headline(s) from the HTML using a CSS selector like `.article-feed-card__hed-text`.

### 💡 Why It Matters:

Some websites block scraping — **Bright Data** ensures you can reliably extract content. The extractor node ensures you get clean, usable text.

> ![🕸️](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/spider-web_1f578-fe0f.png) This is your **web crawler** and **filter**, doing the dirty work of fetching and cleaning up info.

---

## 🟣 **Section 3: Use AI to Write Engaging Posts**

📌 *Nodes:*

* `LinkedIn post writer`
* `X (Twitter) post writer`

### 🛠 What’s Happening:

* 🤖 `LinkedIn post writer`: Passes the headline to an OpenAI Chat Model to turn it into a professional, catchy LinkedIn post.
* 🐦 `X (Twitter) post writer`: Similarly formats a shorter, witty version for X/Twitter.

Both use prompts like:

> “Write a trendy post about the following Vogue headline for \[LinkedIn/Twitter]. Add hashtags. Keep tone professional/casual.”

### 💡 Why It Matters:

AI tailors each post **per platform** — no copy-pasting. Your brand voice is preserved while staying context-aware.

> ![✍️](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/writing-hand_270d-fe0f.png) This is your **copywriting intern** — except it works 24/7 and never gets tired.

---

## 🔴 **Section 4: Auto-Publish to Social Media**

📌 *Nodes:*

* `Publish to LinkedIn`
* `Publish to X (Twitter)`

### 🛠 What’s Happening:

* 💼 `Publish to LinkedIn`: Posts the AI-generated content directly to your **LinkedIn page or profile**.
* 📣 `Publish to X (Twitter)`: Tweets the optimized content via your **Twitter developer account**.

> Note: These nodes are showing ⚠️ errors — make sure authentication and permissions (tokens) are set up correctly.

### 💡 Why It Matters:

This eliminates **manual social media posting** — great for content marketers, personal branding, or agencies.

> ![🚀](https://em-content.zobj.net/thumbs/120/apple/354/rocket_1f680.png) This section is your **launchpad**, sending your posts to the world.

---

# 🧩 Summary Table

| Section | Function                     | What It Does                                     | Key Tools                      |
| ------- | ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------ |
| 1       | Set Target URL               | Tells the system what site to scrape             | `Manual Trigger`, `Set Node`   |
| 2       | Scrape & Extract             | Uses Bright Data to get HTML + Extract headlines | `HTTP Request`, `HTML Extract` |
| 3       | AI Content Generation        | Converts headline into social media post         | `OpenAI`, `Chat Model`         |
| 4       | Auto-Publish to Social Media | Posts to LinkedIn and Twitter                    | `LinkedIn`, `X/Twitter`        |

---

# ✨ Bonus Suggestions

✅ Add a **scheduler** to run this daily
✅ Log posted headlines in **Google Sheets or Notion**
✅ Add a filter to **skip duplicate headlines**

---
